sentences.english: Adding additives in calcium-based sorbents could improve the sulfur capture capacity.

sentences.english: The application of additives in waterborne automotive base coats were introduced.

sentences.english: Then, the water-based road marking coating was prepared by the selected emulsion, filler and auxiliary.

sentences.english: Adjuvants are substances that enhance the immune response in vaccines and can make them more effective.
